definition: to dodge/to evade

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
surname Shan
to hide/to dodge/to avoid

sentences.english: Flinching is preparation for being hit.
sentences.chinese: 闪躲是对挨打所做的准备。

sentences.english: The only exposure that I'm sure does persist is radiation.
sentences.chinese: 我相信唯一我们不能闪躲的就只有辐射。

sentences.english: What am I to you, tell me darling ture.
sentences.chinese: 在你心中我是什么颜色，告诉我亲爱，不要闪躲。

sentences.english: He jumps back as several of the other heads lunge.
sentences.chinese: 当好几个头突然袭来时，他赶紧跳回闪躲。

sentences.english: The unconscious evinces knowledge that , for the most part, escapes the speaking being.
sentences.chinese: 无意识闪躲知识，大部份时间，还闪避说话的主体。

sentences.english: If you're hit, you don't flinch.
sentences.chinese: 如果你挨打的时候并不闪躲。

sentences.english: And when his father raises his hand, he flinches.
sentences.chinese: 他的父亲举起手臂，他就会闪躲。

sentences.english: See skulking Truth to her old cavern fled.

definition: to evade/to dodge (out of the way)
to dodge/to sidestep
to resist/to ward off/to hold one's own/to receive guests
to stay out of (hot water, trouble, awkward situation etc)/to avoid (sb)
to jump out of the way
to get out of the way
to withdraw
to hide/to evade/to dodge/to take shelter/to avoid (difficulties)
to recoil/to draw back/to fall back/to retreat
to step aside (for a passing vehicle)/to get out of the way/to make way for
to escape/to disappear
to hit back/to return fire
to hit with a piercing blow
bombard
(to escape danger etc) by a hair's breadth (idiom)/in a critical state/on the brink of crisis/very close (to happening)/Taiwan pr. [jian4 bu4 rong2 fa3]
to dodge
